ssot__EngagementAnalysisText__dlm.name: Engagement Analysis Text
ssot__EngagementAnalysisText__dlm.description: The Engagement Analysis Text DMO represents a part of an engagement session being analyzed, such as a set of chat messages between an agent and customer.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is the name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextEndDateTime_.description: The date and time when the specific engagement in the session ends.

ssot__Id__c.description: The identifier of the engagement analysis text record.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextSessionId__c.description: The identifier of the engagement analysis text session.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextStartDateTim.description: The date and time when the specific engagement in the session starts.

ssot__EngagementChannelSourceType__c.description: The type of engagement channel source.

ssot__InsightsExtractionStatus__c.description: The status of the content that's processed to get insights.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.
